articles.title: Siegfried Fischbacher of Siegfried and Roy dead at 81 - New York Post
articles.description: The perpetually tanned magic man's death comes less than a year after the passing of his longtime stage partner, Roy Horn, due to complications from COVID-19.
articles.content:
